summary: A group of oppressed factory workers go on strike in pre-revolutionary Russia.
cast: Maksim Shtraukh|Grigoriy Aleksandrov|Mikhail Gomorov|I. Ivanov|Ivan Klyukvin|Aleksandr Antonov|Yudif Glizer|Anatoliy Kuznetsov|Vera Yanukova|Vladimir Uralskiy|M. Mamin|Boris Yurtsev|Daniil Antonovich
director: Director: Sergei M. Eisenstein (as S. Eisenstein)
title: La huelga
